Definition at line 26 of file MM1_RC_TPT.cpp.

27  {
28  MM1_RC_TPT_Output out;
29 
30  // Calculate output for low-pass
31  double v = g1 * (x - s);
32  double y = v + s;
33  out.lp = y;
34 
35  // Update state register
36  s = v + y;
37 
38  // Calculate output for high-pass
39  out.hp = x - y;
40 
41  // Subtract low-pass output from input to find high-pass output
42  return out;
43  }

46  {
47  // Calculate gamma from cutoff
48  const double w = bdsp::consts::TWO_PI * cutoff;
49  const double g = w / (2.0 * sample_rate);
50  g1 = g / (1.0 + g);

55  // Calculate gamma from prewarped cutoff
